extension.name: plg_content_flowplayer
extension.author: Saul Martinez
extension.description:
Loads video (with preroll ads) using the flowplayer jquery plugin

Upload videos to images/videos and thumbnails to images/videos/thumbs.

Upload video ads to images/videos/ads.

To call the plugin type {flowplayer name_of_video}

Note:The video and the thumbnail must have the same name

i.e.

my-video.flv
my-video.jpg
